ValidationRule.description: NICC-056786 Users are not allowed to uncheck the Approved checkbox once checked. Only users with a specific custom permission may uncheck the box.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Operation_Projects", NOT( ISNEW() ), ISCHANGED(Approved__c), Approved__c = FALSE, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Permission.Edit_AH_Project_Backlog_Internal_Projects = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to uncheck the Approved checkbox. Please contact the Process Improvement team for assistance.
